name: Chicken Royale: Challenge Run!
description:
This viral game will make you laugh and scream. Try it yourself!

In Chicken Royale you are competing in road crossing challenge!

Multiplayer simulator allows you to compete with other chickens in crossing the road. Show your skills and beat then in one battle!

In Chicken Royale you can collect various characters to play, even Flamingo and Robot!

Tap CONTROLS:

TAP and HOLD - chicken is crossing the road
DO NOT tap - chicken is going back

Like it? Share your feedback in a review and share this game with your friends!

What are you waiting for, chicken?!

Support:
If you have any technical problems or any feedback please email me at chicken.royale.game@gmail.com

Enjoy!
